org.knopflerfish.service.desktop
Interface BundleSelectionListener

public interface BundleSelectionListener

Callback listener for changes in BundleSelectionModel.

See Also:
SwingBundleDisplayer

Method Summary
 void valueChanged(long bid)
          The model has changed.
 

Method Detail

valueChanged

public void valueChanged(long bid)
The model has changed. Listeners are responsible for checking any other info on the bundle (as location, state etc) themselves.

Parameters:
bid - Bundle ID that has changes, or -1 if the model has become empty.
